content: I love the game just needs something to make the government and house of reps or letting the players choose between a senate like system or a parliamentary system or a more dictator based system maybe could consider it for the second game
Always gives you a terrible start and your popularity goes up and down with no rhyme or reason
Realy good game
Excellent game.

Fun game, but the polling AI seems really random sometimes. E.g. I went from 16-ish % to 1% in three legislation periods while not giving false promises in interviews, scandals or any other events. Really frustrating when you put a lot of money into your campaigns and laws. Also when having multiple parties (~4+), some laws will NEVER get through (except you get a majority which is extremely hard) because there's usually no bipartisan support at all. So at some point it's always the same laws...

Amazing game, would be nice to add ministers to *this* game and also would be nice to see that you can form government if you form a majority outright or if nobody forms a majority, negotiations on a coalition occur; would LOVE to see that happen for Australia since that's how it actually works in Australia, good game, 5 stars if you add the thing I said about the coalition's and forming government❤️

I bought premium, very great. I have written a review in the game, I hope you'll read it, but to make a point - changing name, initials and ideology of party during game, creating a country on your own (as you make a party) so I can have my birth country in the game, and DESCRIPTIONS OF LAWS. More was in review
Why the US have a Parliament when we have a Congress will it get fixed
I'm waiting anxiously for the lawgivers II, I can't wait for this.
Been a good game, really looking forward to the sequel which should come out on the next few months. Don't get too hung up on realistic laws or mechanics and enjoy this game for what it is!

A few minor bugs. Example: I made a political promise to fix the budget to a certain point within a time limit. My income was higher than the deficit and was going to clear 5 turns before my time was up. I was watching it every turn. I made a separate promise to raise democracy, which I did, but when I achieved that objective it told me I hadn't fixed the budget objective in the time limit, lowering my approval. It didn't sink me or anything, but it's a little frustrating and disheartening.
This is an amazing game, please keep developing it!

I can't really rate the game play because I can't figure out a lot of the mechanics. There are options and icons that have no explanation. The tutorial is brief and not helpful. So I give it 2 stars because I'm sure there's a large portion of players who can't figure the game out and that's just not good.

I liked the idea of the game. But it's been hours, and I still don't understand the mechanics much. Sometimes the thing works, sometimes not. Some icons are without explanation. I can't play the game when I don't get it. In the discord channel, they say the game is pretty intuitive. I may disagree. I wish there was some simple text wiki/guide
replyContent: Hi Alex! Thank you for playing :) it's true that the explanation could be better as well as other things, this is why we are preparing a second game which will bring many improvements. We are sorry that you cannot understand some things, if you want, just keep asking in discord and we will try to solve your doubts as soon as possible. Greetings :)

content: Descriptions aren't clear - for example, one voting option is "citizens vote" - not sure what I'm actually voting for by approving that. However, my bigger issue is that there is clear bias behind the game - voting for gun prohibition reduces security, voting for same sex marriage reduces happiness, almost any tax creates sadness - these are all quite biased views which many do not share. I feel like having certain things set in stone as "good" or "bad" makes this game unappealing to many
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. I value your honest opinion very much and will greatly improve the game with the upcoming update 1.6. Have a nice day!
